trans-unit.source: Represents a read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta in sola lettura di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation" />.

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformationCollection> collection, call one of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformationCollection> raccolta, chiamare uno del <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> overload del metodo.

trans-unit.source: Each collection contains a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation> object for each manifest that was verified by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ogni raccolta contiene un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation> oggetto per ogni manifesto che Ã¨ stata verificata mediante la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> metodo.
